title: The Five
creator_credit: Halas and Batchelor Cartoon Films and Joy Batchelor
brief_description: An animated health education film for school children designed to create a positive attitude in the minds of young girls aged 8-12 years. it seeks to encourage them to look after their feet, and emphasises the importance of wearing correctly fitted shoes. Animated by Harold Whitaker.
